original_text: “Settle matters quickly with your adversary who is taking you to court. Do it while you are still together on the way, or your adversary may hand you over to the judge, and the judge may hand you over to the officer, and you may be thrown into prison.
korean_text: 너를 고발하는 자와 함께 길에 있을 때에 급히 사화하라 그 고발하는 자가 너를 재판관에게 내어 주고 재판관이 옥리에게 내어 주어 옥에 가둘까 염려하라

sentences.original_text: who is taking you to court
Do it while you are still together on the way
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 함께 길을 가는 동안에 해결하라

sentences.original_text: or your adversary may hand you over to the judge
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇지 않으면 상대방이 너를 재판관에게 넘겨주고

sentences.original_text: and the judge may hand you over to the officer
and you may be thrown into prison
